mapper.update: update `sendrecord` set userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context = #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
